body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Anthony Bailey and the customer's name is Rose Lewis.  The conversation is about a random business (a Marketing Agency ) and is a conversation about product quality.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Anthony Bailey, and I am an agent with Creative Horizons Marketing Agency.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Rose! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit frustrated with the quality of my recent marketing materials.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm really sorry to hear that. Can you please provide me with your email address so I can look up your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rose! And could you also share your phone number with me, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three four five six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! I’ve noted that down. Now, can you tell me more about the specific issues you’re facing with the materials?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The colors are not as vibrant as I expected, and some of the text is hard to read.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate you sharing that with me, Rose. I will escalate this issue to our quality assurance team.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help, Anthony.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time, Rose. I hope we can resolve this quickly for you. Have a great day!
